MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY24 postcode area of Bow Street, affecting properties in Llandre and surrounding areas. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:45AM due to a faulty piece of equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:59AM on 28th November 2020.
